items.text: Top 5 Nigerian celebrities whose songs sound the same.
Which Nigerian artist would survive in the international market for more than a year?
That one celebrity who pretends to be humble but posts everything they buy.
Who is the most overrated Nigerian celebrity?
Nigerian celebrities always starting drama on Twitter to promote an album.
Who has the most dramatic 'breakup' stories?
That celebrity who can't sing but always on the charts.
If Nigerian celebrities were food, who would be the most overpriced?
How many Nigerian celebrities have had to switch their brand for a new trend?
Who is the most likely Nigerian artist to start a feud just for publicity?
Top 3 Nigerian politicians who are always in the news for the wrong reasons.
Which politician has mastered the art of dodging questions?
The politician who says 'I am not here to make money' and then buys a private jet.
Which Nigerian politician is most likely to confuse a national address with a campaign speech?
Politician X just announced they’re buying their 5th mansion this year—recession, what recession?
Which politician has the best 'I-did-not-know-that' face?
The politician who always makes promises that never come true.
Who is the politician most likely to act surprised when their corruption case gets exposed?
The politician who can speak for 3 hours without saying anything concrete.
Which Nigerian politician would be the worst at explaining a budget?
That actress who is always ‘hustling’ but never working.
Who is the most 'chameleon-like' actress in Nollywood?
Actress who is always in drama but never actually acting.
Which Nollywood actress would do the best in Hollywood?
The one actress who always gets the same roles—no variety.
Which actress is most likely to win an award for doing absolutely nothing?
That actress who’s always playing the 'girl next door' but you know she’s anything but.
Who’s the actress who always gets caught in a viral scandal?
The actress who’s more famous for her social media than her acting.
Which actress can you bet is definitely getting a job because of her connection?
Top 5 footballers who shouldn't even be playing at this point.
Which footballer would make the best comedian?
That player who celebrates scoring by doing something no one understands.
Which footballer has the most ridiculous hairstyle?
The footballer who's always injured, yet still plays every match.
Who is the footballer that everyone secretly wants to see fail?
The footballer who can do everything except play football.
Which footballer would survive on a reality show?
The footballer who is clearly only playing for the money.
Who would be the worst at managing a football club?
Drake’s beef with Kendrick Lamar is one of the longest running non-beefs.
Which American celebrity could run for president, and it wouldn't be a joke?
50 Cent has been at war with Rick Ross for years, and it's still hilarious.
Who is the most likely to come up with a feud just to stay relevant?
Kanye West and his ‘political ambitions’—no one knows what he’s actually running for.
Which celebrity’s public relationship is clearly all for PR?
When you have a million-dollar contract but still act like you’re in the streets.
Who is the most likely to make a comeback after a scandal?
That one celebrity who always has a Twitter meltdown every month.
Which celebrity would be the most interesting if they were stuck on a desert island?
Top 5 influencers who got famous for nothing but selfies.
Who has the most embarrassing viral moment in social media history?
The influencer who's always flexing but never shows their real life.
Which influencer would survive the longest on reality TV?
That influencer who can sell anything—literally, anything.
Which influencer would win a gold medal in pretending?
The influencer who’s more famous for their drama than their content.
Which influencer has mastered the art of looking rich without actually being rich?
When an influencer's brand collab is more famous than the influencer themselves.
Which influencer is most likely to start a ‘scandal’ for more followers?
